rules_text:
Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Cleric[/b] | Whenever this creature attacks, untap it and another creature you control.
[b]Wizard[/b] | Whenever this creature attacks, it and up to one other creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
